Text: Re Whats happeningMike So is the coal group a core group As regards job offers I have not tried as yet If you recall I accepted the Enron offer before October And that meant I could not participate in the campus placement process And the process that started in the first week of October is almost over My only option it to wait and see and probably take some action in the next semester Lets see how things play out Rajneesh Taylor Michael E wrote Raj Things are tough People are thinking tomorrow is the day for a lot of layoffs for noncore groups chance we merge with Dynegy is what some people are saying Bankruptcy is our other option The working environment is not good The firm needs to lay off people now as opposed to dragging it out I think the good groups will be sold off to the highest bidders or competitors just buy up all our talented people when the company under Any news about your job offer Are you looking again Mike Original Message From Rajneesh Salhotra mailto Sent Monday November PM To Taylor Michael E Subject Whats happening Hey Mike Hope you had a great thanksgiving weekend I used it to check out NYC Anyway whats your take on the future of the firm And how are the employees reacting so far Its difficult to recall a weekday when the WSJ does not carry an Enronrelated article And now it seems the merger is doubtful Rajneesh This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
